tool_description: This API allows you to retrieve information about a specific video or reel on Facebook. You can use it to retrieve details such as the post title, description, thumbnail, video, reel. With the Facebook Downloader API, you can easily access and leverage the wealth of information available on Post.   telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode

title: Facebook Video and Reel Downloader
